data.text: @DatWizarDS @Shupa_RS @edimmuz @RuneScape Can I get a link? I looked back through a fair bit of their tweets and saw nothing like that. Also watched through the BTS & didn't see it there either. And I'm fairly sure they would've hyped that up in the BTS at the very least.
@DatWizarDS @Shupa_RS @edimmuz @RuneScape Oh? I hope you're right! Would be nice to have it on the flight to, and at RF

@RuneScape How about a new Elite skill. Actually put Sailing into the game that requires 80 Construction, 80 Crafting and 80 Fishing to start. Building boats and going out to see to gain new types of fish only able by Sailing skill. Just an idea i came up with.
@RuneScape Dont know how that would turn out. Ima have to disagree with this, that wouldn't be a good idea for a skill.
@RuneScape Great idea. Make it the next elite skill
@RuneScape No. Absolutely not.
@RuneScape Yes please would be so cool like level 120 you could turn into mini versions of bosses or be able to go into combat in a different form :0

@MrNecrosisRS @RuneScape But that game, similar to how a druid works in WoW, have mechanics built around it. That would be a lot of work to add mechanics and balance around something as individualistic as a skill, unless it paired with other skills. Just a thought, what would be the other skills... 🤔
@RuneScape @JitterbugRS Level 3/99, baby
@RuneScape Is this the idea for a Summoning and Hunter Elite Skill? - R
@RuneScape This has been proposed many times as a support skill for summoning and slayer but don’t trust the current staff to be able@to get this done

@RuneScape Can we have a Customer Service skill first? Level up by posting requests on Twitter and every time a mod does something we get xp. That way leveling up would be so rare it'll actually be an achievement.
@RuneScape How about sailing, @RuneScape ?
@RuneScape Let’s just say it’s a very interesting idea could be very good skill
@RuneScape Heck yeah, would be better as a new spell book tho
@RuneScape Go home, Runescape, you're drunk xD... Sounds really hard to implement, but the idea sounds goooood :P
@RuneScape I would like to see a necromancer skill over shapeshifting skill.
@RuneScape I love that idea could tie into Hunter or herblore or summoning or all 3
@RuneScape No thanks. Puerile.
@RuneScape Bad
@NateTheComputer @RuneScape It's a good idea

@RuneScape So like Invention, but agility, summoning, and magic? That sounds like a lot of fun, and can you /imagine/ the quest puzzles? Plus, with Frag!Sliske + WG-ness, Mahjarrat can shapeshift so it makes perfect sense lorewise for us to gain that ability.

@RuneScape Shapeshifting has more of a druidic/mage feel to it so it should just be merged in with magic as opposed to it's own separate skill. Maybe make it into it's own druidic spell book that's based around nature and nature spells
@RuneScape Shapeshift to avoid aggro? 😒
@RuneScape Not really down with a new skill atm finish invention an mining rework
@RuneScape yes as well as a riding skill for mounts!!
@FlynnMunroeLive @RuneScape Maybe put crafting and dunging in it too.

@RuneScape also im envisioning something like a diablo2/rs crossover for shapeshifting, oh also while were at it, maybe expand summoning in rs3 to have a second summoning tab, for...wait for it..... NECROMANCY!  but actual necromancy where they can fight for u n sht not osrs necro thats dum
@RuneScape AMAZING IDEA!!!
@RuneScape How bout that bank rework tho...
@RuneScape @Zachary_Arnold2 what do you think?
@RuneScape Bad
@RuneScape Sounds cool. Good idea if it doesn't make the game too easy, but bad if people exploit this new ability
@RuneScape No. We have summoning.
@RuneScape If I can turn into a fox good if not it’s a bad skill
@Shupa_RS @RuneScape you're kidding me.... I'm excited for mobile more than anyone.. but bro....

@RuneScape Shapeshifting [Druidism? In games like WoW and Diablo dont druids usually shapeshift?] and necromancy. Id like to see them both. Necromancy has been something ive wanted since 2006 when I met the necro himself, Malignus Mortifer i think.
@RSColifin @RuneScape only furries think shapeshifting is about furries
@Shupa_RS @edimmuz @RuneScape It got put on hold until they "hit a certain milestone with mobile." Year 2255 or so is the new ETA. :p
@RuneScape MOUNTS

@RuneScape Haven't really thought about what a skill of the sort would bring to the game, but right now I'd much rather see bug fixes, general improvements, and basically better fleshed out updates over new content for a little while.

@RuneScape Hmm, it could be interesting. Starting out at low level things like rats or mice and as the level goes up, being able to shapeshift into better and stronger things such as wolves and dragons.
@RuneScape Shut up and finish the gnome quest line.
@RuneScape Ehh, id need to see it in practice. Maybe another elite skill with high level Mage/Div/Summoning?
@RuneScape @JitterbugRS Don’t worry about why...just make it happen
@RuneScape Great idea!!! Would be so cool 😎 I could finally become a unicorn
@RuneScape Downright should be another combat method/type and not just a skill.
@RuneScape Make it another Elite Skill centered around herblore, summoning, and magic
@RuneScape Cooking invention, Fixing the banks, player owned farming, and finishing mining/smithing rework are all ahead of a new skill for me
@RuneScape sounds like a cool new skill tbh

@RuneScape I like the cosmetic rings that turn you into a rock, Bush,etc. I also like the idea of discontinued items. It's like owning a piece of history exclusive to that period of time. I hate the rwters and how it got ruined. I love collecting rare history as ahobby
@RuneScape bruh yes please add shape shifting so when i defeat a boss i can morph into them as a trick and this would be a great thing to add for quests
@RuneScape So many things to re-work / improve and you guys thinking in new skill... that's why after invention (crap skill) so many people quit

@RuneScape I like it. But maybe we can have Divine Holy Magics as another Elite skill,Requiring 85 Magic, Divination, Rune crafting,invention and Prayer. It would allow us to tap into the energy of the God's through the energy harvested from Divination.
@RuneScape Sure! Let's go! If anything, it could be a skilling-only way of training magic.
@Mr_G_W @RuneScape The👏furry👏agenda👏needs👏to👏be👏stopped.
@CatlinWill @RuneScape @JitterbugRS Everyone would call me that in middle and high school, missed opportunity on my part for not having my handles and game tags as that.

@RuneScape I like the idea ... Expand on that with the fact we have transformation rings of characters but can't walk around in those forms... Please make this a reality... Just don't let trees walk... We have enough issues with gods without adding ents to the mix.
@RuneScape whatever helps bring about furries in the game. https://t.co/4fOmBQCDux
@ShaunThePhoenix @RuneScape @JitterbugRS Shaun the Sheep! https://t.co/ItuAqQPOSD
@RuneScape If you made it possbile to shape into different species, like Elfs, Orcs and Werewolfs. Actually just hire me as creative ideas specialist. Ill do all the work 😂😎
@RuneScape I wanna shape shift into a bee so I can go pick up that Ruby ring under west bank
@RuneScape We have rings for that don’t we?
@RuneScape Another summoning skill

@RuneScape Yes please, I'd have a fresh skill to make guides on. Oh and...

PANIC SELL WANDSSSSS
@RuneScape BAD. Very very bad idea
@RuneScape good idea, always wanted one.
@RuneScape New fight mode! Good idea but complex to implement. Still I love the idea https://t.co/MN9h323dQG
@RuneScape Lolno, make all the stuff u’ve been talking about for so long & stop delaying it then maybe new skills or w/e after
@RuneScape Soinds like an expantion to Familiarisation. But thats about it.
@RuneScape I'm more interested in the lore it will be focused on. How will the story of shapeshifting be told?
@FlynnMunroeLive @RuneScape What would archeology bring to the table? It could be a minigame, sure, but a whole skill?
@RuneScape Would be pretty dope but y'all banned my account that got hacked
@RuneScape Personally, I'd rather see the bank rework and mining/smithing update before anything.
@RuneScape As useful as 99 firemaking

@RuneScape Fix the bank first 

You promised

@RuneScape I can finally live my D&D Druid dreams. Could actually be expanded into different skills as well. Combat with unique abilities for the shapechanged form, or something like a bear form giving gains in fishing. 

Just the D&D nerd in me talking, I'll go back to leveling.
@RuneScape Not a new skill. Maybe a new spell book?
@RuneScape Add the shapeshifting as potions for herbalor seeing as you already have a goblin potion. The potion looses effect when tping or equipping an item
@RuneScape @JitterbugRS for the same reason the penguins do.
@RuneScape no. players should not emulate the filthy mahjarrat.

@RuneScape It's good. You could have shapeshifting for combat and Skilling, like turn into beaver to cut down trees or a shark to fish. And high level could turn into a dragon and get firebreath in combat. It would be very similar to summoning though.
@RuneScape Horrible
@RuneScape How about if you fix all the game problems and bugs there are. Listen to your community and slow down the MTX. After that you can think of a new skill.
@RuneScape Bad skill idea. I think you need to increase the size of the map, shit is getting cramped

@RuneScape I generally don’t really see a point other than what others have said about possibly an addition to summoning. Rather than summoning them you become them to then manually control the familiars abilities.
@RuneScape It could be another elite skill with Magic, Divination, and Summoning serving as the requirements to unlock it.
@RuneScape Oh jeez this was a more polarizing thing to bring to the attention of the community than I thought lol
@VegetaPOAS @RuneScape I do play osrs you little minx
@AlexBidoofus @RuneScape just go play osrs lazy mofo
@RuneScape Sailing👌
@RuneScape That would be interesting also pact with there special own combat abilities
@SockehMonkeh @RuneScape That's coming next week socks

@RuneScape would be awsome

like speed buffs while in those forms 

but the way ya have runescape it would be useless
i cant think of anything good

boosts to skills like hunting in a form of something good at hunting etc

but eh  im just waiting on mining and smithing rework rly
@RuneScape No.
@RuneScape as long as its used responable.
@RuneScape @JitterbugRS https://t.co/vEKQGQkunS
@Future6602 @CoNNFarnworth @RuneScape jagex ruined runescape after 2012
@RuneScape Not sure how well it'd work as a new skill, kinda seems more like an extension of Summoning in my mind. Instead of summoning the creature, you become them.
@RuneScape Yes plz!!
@RuneScape Good idea
@RuneScape Bad unless there’s a million percent that it’s going to be useful
@RuneScape Yeah sounds great! Let’s try shape shifting RS3 into OSRS
@RuneScape We already have summoning just add more animals like actual animals
@RuneScape That doesnt sound like a Runescape skill. Imo we dont need new skills atm.
@RuneScape Sound very hard to implement, potential game breaker.. so, bad idea
@JitterbugRS But, why...
@RuneScape Engineering would be better.
@RuneScape Could be fun
@RuneScape Any new skill is good.
@CoNNFarnworth @RuneScape No really, what would a new skill add? More backlog for them to get through. They need to fix what's wrong with current game rather than adding more.
@RuneScape A new skill would be awesome, however I’d settle for a new quest at this point! We have had 2 quests in the last 9 months!! One of which was a mini/bottle quest 😩
@RuneScape Necromancer I like more.
@RuneScape Yes
@RuneScape Shapeshift a Easter event

@RuneScape Jagex, you’ve enough backlogged updates to last 2 or 3 yrs at your current rate of updating. I wouldn’t concern yourself with the idea of a new skill until at least 2020. And I can’t imagine a shapeshifting skill ever being implemented well, especially if it is a combat skill.
@RuneScape E-Dating skill : )
@RuneScape Can’t we have a merchant skill that gives us bonus from shops and additional from GE etc
@RuneScape If it makes quests more interesting...

@Quick_Hand_Cam @RuneScape Well the way I was thinking of it was; if you ever played dragon age, you could shapeshift into spiders, bears etc. with benefits to both such as binding as spider and more fortitude and power as a bear. Maybe if those were benefits you would gain?
@RuneScape Bad

@RuneScape Bad. Either it'll end up a practically useless skill offering no useful alternatives to certain goals like in mabinogi, or it'll end up a part of power- and feature-creep, providing a superior alternative to other goals that becomes the preferred option over any other method.
@RuneScape I think you should introduce a new skill but not shapeshifting. A new skill would probably encourage people to return to the game
@RuneScape A new skill would be nice as long as its not similar to any of the current skills.
@RuneScape Would be interesting if it's use benefits different skills regardless of level, a support skill that is also cosmetic and fun oriented perhaps?
@RuneScape What would this even accomplish for the game other than rp?
@RuneScape @LazerLatte a new skill might encourage me to return to the game
@RuneScape Good
@RuneScape no

@RuneScape Imo it would be better to expand Summoning than to add shapeshifting, being able to temporarily take over your familiar for puzzles or whatever would be better than adding a whole new skill for it. That being said, we would need more useful familiars to do that.
@RuneScape Great idea! I want to be able to transform into a sheep.
@RuneScape Good idea
@RuneScape Yes please
@RuneScape No. Even more options for Solomon to milk us. Fucking cosmetics.

@RuneScape Flat transformation for specific perks? Maybe good for skilling and traversing but not for combat.
What about "aspects" which would be like creature souls to give various buffs? Sorry if there's something like that already, I'm not really familiar with members.
@RuneScape https://t.co/RSy2w3V91u
@BobDaStreamer @RuneScape good idea, it can be an elite skill combined with summoning
@RuneScape depends on how you make it
@RuneScape HELL YEAH

@RuneScape i mean, would be fun if every shapeshift had clear strengths and weaknesses, so it wouldnt just be everyone in one shape anyways
@RuneScape 👀Very good idea
@RuneScape We already have Summoning/ Familiarization. It’d get too confusing.
@RuneScape If you get buffs and debuffs for being seid animals/monsters/humans, sure
@RuneScape Baaaaaad
@RuneScape It's be cool to be implemented but I'm not so sure there is a way where it would work with the game.
@RuneScape If this means we can permanently unlock new player models to become other creatures and play as them instead of being human, sure, why not?
@RuneScape Yes please
